import {useHistory} from "react-router-dom" import {RiDeleteBin6Fill} from "react-icons/ri" import {decodeJwtToken} from "../Utils/function" function CardRoom({room}){ const history = useHistory() const {userName} = decodeJwtToken() return<>
{room.roomName}

Admin : {room.admin.name}

history.push(`/room/${room.roomName}`, room)}>Get Inside

{room.admin.name===userName&&}
} export default CardRoom
